attributes.additional_details: It has been put in the papers
attributes.background: A week ago we were told that the council are going to close the harbour house. Because of thier decition some may be placed into care (such as me partly because of the closure)

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This decision is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
